briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of Ombitasvir/Paritaprevir/Ritonavir and Dasabuvir With or Without Ribavirin in US Veterans With Genotype 1 Chronic Hepatitis C Virus Infection
officialTitle: An Open-Label, Multicenter Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of Ombitasvir/Paritaprevir/Ritonavir and Dasabuvir With or Without Ribavirin (RBV) in US Veterans With Genotype 1 Chronic Hepatitis C Virus (HCV) Infection (TOPAZ-VA)
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of ombitasvir/paritaprevir/ritonavir and dasabuvir with or without ribavirin in US veterans with genotype 1 chronic hepatitis C virus infection.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Sustained Virologic Response 12 Weeks Post-treatment (SVR12)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 12 weeks after the last actual dose of study drug
